original_title: Mega-CNC Router Carves Styrofoam Into a Full-Size Flying Delorean
original_content:
When you own an enormous CNC router, youve got to find projects that justify it. So why not shoot for the sky  literally  and build the 1980s-est possible thing: a full-scale flying Delorean.
Attentive readers will no doubt remember [Brian Brocken] from his recent attempt to bring a welding robot out of retirement. That worked quite well, and equipped with a high-speed spindle, the giant ABB robot is now one of the biggest CNC routers weve ever seen. As for the flying Delorean, short of the well-known Mr. Fusion mod, [Brian] had to settle for less fictional approaches. The project is still in its early phase, but it appears that the flying car will basically be a huge quadcopter, with motors and propellers hidden under the chassis. That of course means eschewing the stainless steel of the OEM design for something lighter: expanded polystyrene foam (EPS).
The video below shows the fabrication of most of the body, which starts as large blocks of EPS and ends up as shaped panels and an unthinkable amount of dust. Individual pieces are glued together with what looks like plain old PVA adhesive. The standard Delorean frunk has been replaced by a louvered assembly that will act as an air intake; we presume the rear engine cover will get the same treatment. Interestingly, the weight of the finished model is almost exactly what Fusion 360 predicted based on the 3D model  a mere 13.9 kg.
[Brian] is currently thrust-testing motors and propellers and has some interesting details on that process in his write-up. Theres obviously a lot of work left on this project, and a lot more dust to be made, and well be eagerly following along.
title: デロリアンをフライングカーに改造：巨大なクワッドコプターで実現
body: 巨大なCNCルーターを所有しているなら、それに見合うプロジェクトを見つける必要があります。そこで、可能な限り1980年代らしさを追求し、フルスケールの飛行デロリアンを建てることにしました。フライングカーは巨大なクアッドコプターになる予定で、モーターやプロペラはシャーシの下に隠されます。展開ポリスチレンフォームで作られたボディの製作過程が動画で紹介されています。完成したモデルの重量は、3Dモデルに基づいて予測された重量とほぼ一致しています。モーターやプロペラのテストも行われており、プロジェクトの進捗に注目です。
